name: Shellycreator
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shelly creator
Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to Shelly Creator, the ultimate assistant for building and managing personalized smart home scenes. Designed for Shelly device users, this skill enables you to automate your home environment through custom scenes tailored to your preferences. Whether you're looking to optimize lighting, adjust room temperatures, or create a cozy ambiance, Shelly Creator makes it all possible with simple voice commands.
